data.prayer: Spirit, please convict each believer in Sirmaur, Himachal Pradesh, India to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 524,071 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Sirmaur, Himachal Pradesh, India
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Lord, make the 5,829 believers in Sirmaur to be brave and clear with the gospel to their 524,071 neighbors.
data.verse: So Paul and Barnabas spent considerable time there, speaking boldly for the Lord, who confirmed the message of his grace by enabling them to perform signs and wonders.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage those who are afraid in Sirmaur, Himachal Pradesh, India that you are the healer and you are the Savior.
data.verse: Heal me, Lord, and I will be healed; save me and I will be saved, for you are the one I praise.

data.prayer: Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Sirmaur, Himachal Pradesh, India.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.prayer: Lord we ask you on behalf of the Rajput Atiras people. 0.0% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Father, remind your church in Sirmaur, Himachal Pradesh, India that you have set your Son over all rule and authority, power and dominion, and every name that is invoked.
data.verse: he raised Christ from the dead and seated him at his right hand in the heavenly realms, far above all rule and authority, power and dominion, and every name that is invoked, not only in the present age but also in the one to come.

data.prayer: Father, please make every disciple be a disciple maker, every home a training center, and every church a church planting movement in the county of Sirmaur.
Lord, like in the church of Antioch, where you gathered many prophets and teachers, please gather many prophets and teachers in the county of Sirmaur, Himachal Pradesh, India.
data.verse: Now in the church at Antioch there were prophets and teachers: Barnabas, Simeon called Niger, Lucius of Cyrene, Manaen (who had been brought up with Herod the tetrarch), and Saul.

location.name: Sirmaur
location.people_groups_list: Rajput Bais (Sikh traditions), Jat Dhindsa (Sikh traditions), Jat Ghangas, Gaddi (Muslim traditions), Bazigar (Sikh traditions)
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Rajput Bais (Sikh traditions) (12,000), Jat Dhindsa (Sikh traditions) (44,000), Jat Ghangas (200), Gaddi (Muslim traditions) (431,000), Bazigar (Sikh traditions) (106,000)
